scripts.build: echo "Ensuring pnpm@10.11.0 is used via npx..." && npx pnpm@10.11.0 --version && cd ../.. && echo "Running pnpm install via npx with custom store path..." && PNPM_STORE_PATH=/workspace/.pnpm-store npx pnpm@10.11.0 install --frozen-lockfile --prefer-offline && echo "Running nx build via npx pnpm exec with custom store path..." && PNPM_STORE_PATH=/workspace/.pnpm-store npx pnpm@10.11.0 exec nx build test-app --configuration=production && echo "Build script finished."
scripts.start: echo "Ensuring pnpm@10.11.0 is used for start script via npx..." && npx pnpm@10.11.0 --version && cd ../.. && PNPM_STORE_PATH=/workspace/.pnpm-store npx pnpm@10.11.0 exec serve -s dist/apps/test-app/browser -l tcp://0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8080}
